title: NANOPARTICLE-BASED formulation of dihydroartemisinin-lumefantrine duo-drugs: Preclinical Evaluation and enhanced antimalarial efficacy in a mouse model
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Pesila Akeyo Odera, Geoffrey Otieno, Joab Otieno Onyango, James Jorum Owuor, Florence Anyango Oloo, Martin Ongas, Jeremiah Gathirwa, Bernhards Ogutu
